focusedAbilities.desc: At the start of your turn, you gain 3 Basic Tokens of one type, 2 Basic tokens of a different type, and 1 Basic token of the final type.
focusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

fusedAbilities.desc: At the start of your turn, you gain 2 Basic Tokens of one type, and 1 Basic token of each other type.
fusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

franticAbilities.desc: At the start of this turn, you gain 3 Basic Tokens of one type, 2 Basic tokens of a different type, and 1 Basic token of the final type.
franticAbilities.trigger: at the start of this turn

actions.name: XYZ-BURST
actions.desc:
You heal X, then teleport Y, then deal Z damage to an enemy within range.
X is equal to the number of Iron tokens spent to pay for this.
Y is equal to twice the number of Speed tokens spent.
Z is equal to the number of Power tokens spent.
Usable once per turn, only during your own turn.

alphaSuper.name: Draining Knuckle
alphaSuper.desc: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy, and they discard all Basic Tokens they hold. Then, you gain 2 Power tokens, 2 Iron tokens, and 3 Speed tokens.

deltaSuper.name: Drive Install
deltaSuper.desc: You gain 6 Power tokens, 6 Iron tokens, and 6 Speed tokens. For the rest of this fight, you can spend 1 more Power token and 1 more Iron token per hit. For the rest of this fight, you only discard 1 Speed token at the end of each turn, instead of 3 of them.
